mycom.android.sdklib.internal.build
类 DebugKeyProvider

java.lang.Object
  mycom.android.sdklib.internal.build.DebugKeyProvider

public class DebugKeyProvider
extends java.lang.Object

A provider of a dummy key to sign Android application for debugging purpose.

This provider uses a custom keystore to create and store a key with a known password.

嵌套类摘要

构造方法详细信息

DebugKeyProvider

public DebugKeyProvider(java.lang.String osKeyStorePath,
                        java.lang.String storeType,
                        DebugKeyProvider.IKeyGenOutput output)
                 throws java.security.KeyStoreException,
                        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                        java.security.cert.CertificateException,
                        java.security.UnrecoverableEntryException,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        DebugKeyProvider.KeytoolException,
                        AndroidLocation.AndroidLocationException
Creates a provider using a keystore at the given location.

The keystore, and a new random android debug key are created if they do not yet exist.

Password for the store/key is android, and the key alias is AndroidDebugKey.

参数：
osKeyStorePath - the OS path to the keystore, or null if the default one is to be used.
storeType - an optional keystore type, or null if the default is to be used.
output - an optional DebugKeyProvider.IKeyGenOutput object to get the stdout and stderr of the keytool process call.
抛出：
DebugKeyProvider.KeytoolException - If the creation of the debug key failed.
AndroidLocation.AndroidLocationException
java.security.KeyStoreException
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
java.security.cert.CertificateException
java.security.UnrecoverableEntryException
java.io.IOException

                                                 throws DebugKeyProvider.KeytoolException,
                                                        AndroidLocation.AndroidLocationException
Returns the OS path to the default debug keystore.

The OS path to the default debug keystore.
抛出：

                                     throws java.security.KeyStoreException,
                                            java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                            java.security.UnrecoverableKeyException,
                                            java.security.UnrecoverableEntryException
Returns the debug PrivateKey to use to sign applications for debug purpose.

返回：
the private key or null if its creation failed.

java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
